Articles.Content:
Hey guys,

I recently made my first space station and was my second time ever docking. I am quite proud of it and do not want it to be ruined by this little decoupler. I'm scared that I might accidentaly stage and split the fuel tank and engine away from the construct. Is there any way to remove the decoupler without rebuilding the entire thing? It took me quite a while to put together and a quick way out would help a lot. Here is a screen shot of the decoupler.

1: Edit the persistence.sfs file, look for your ship, then the part, remove it.

2: Press F5 to quciksave. If you do something wrong, hold F9 to go back.

3: ALT+L locks the staging.
